releaseNotes: Modified ElectroWrite Project - ElectroOffice.Installer (Added File Type DOCX, Added File Type EWRITE, Modified File Type EWRITE - Added Icon), Modified ElectroWrite Project (Added File Icon - EWRITE, Added App Icon - ElectroWrite Updater), Modified ElectroWrite Project - Modified ElectroWrite.Updater.xaml (Added App Icon - ElectroWrite Updater, Resized Window and added padding UI polishes), and Modified ElectroWrite Project - Modified ElectroWrite.Updater.xaml.cs (Fixed & Readded Downloading Phase Flashing, Added 'Connecting to Server' Phase, Added Retry Connection with Cooldown, Added Cache Update/Resumable Download, Added Update UI Stage Polishes, Added Update Rollback if fails, Modified Update Progess Bar UI - Stages are now smooth!, Added Error Color Animation to Progress Bar, Added Retry Update Installation Feature, Added Error Log File Feature, Added Blue flashing/fading text UI to Connecting Stage, Added Restart Download when Update link refreshes - To ensure latest update & prevent corruption, Added New Update Event Logger, Severity-Based Logs to Update Event Logger, Added View Updater Log Button, Added Checksum Verification Stage, Added Progress Bar Glow for Update Stages, Added Fade in/Fade out Breathing Glowing Effect to Progress Bar, Smooth Cross-fade bettween glow colors to Progress Bar, Added Progress Bar Glow Intensity based on Speed/Disk Activity for Update Stages)
